subject: Re: [junit]Testing XML data
msgSnippet: ... EXML, (http://www.themindelectric.com/products/xml/docs/xml/guide/index.html) , amongst other nice features, offers XML Matching (testing for equality, and
messageBody:
VOIRY,ANTOINE (HP-France,ex2) wrote:

> I... would like to be able to compare the xml received with an expected result.


EXML,
(http://www.themindelectric.com/products/xml/docs/xml/guide/index.html)
, amongst other nice features, offers XML Matching (testing for
equality, and pattern matching).


Alain Ravet
